TEXT: The applicant is a NORP national , born in DATE and living in GPE , GPE .
He is represented before the ORG by Mr PERSON , a lawyer practising in GPE , GPE .
The applicant arrived in GPE in DATE where he remained in a camp for refugees until DATE . Then he was transferred with the aid of the ORG to GPE , where he was granted asylum .

On DATE the applicant was arrested in GPE for a series of larceny allegedly committed in that country in DATE . He was detained on remand until DATE , when he was released on bail by the indictment chamber of ORG ( simvulio PERSON ) of GPE , which was competent to hear the case at first instance because of the nature of the offences . However , the court ordered that the applicant should remain in GPE until his trial .

On DATE the indictment chamber of ORG considered that there could be no serious suspicion that the applicant had committed the offences he had been charged with because at the relevant time he was in GPE , as it transpired from a series of official documents produced by him . It authorised the applicant to leave GPE .
On DATE the applicant was acquitted by ORG ( Efetio ) of GPE .
The Code of Criminal Procedure provides as follows :
